user_query: As a student of Islam, I have a question regarding the role of women in Islamic society. Can you provide me with an answer? Furthermore, let's continue our previous conversation with our Islam&AI Bot and discuss the concept of hijab.

TaskList.description: Gather information regarding the role of women in Islamic society.
required_inputs: topic: role of women in Islamic society

TaskList.description: Fetch previous conversation context with the Islam&AI Bot.
Continue the discussion with the Islam&AI Bot on the concept of hijab.
